mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON_DETAIL WHERE USERID='mhj' AND DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE() GROUP BY USERID;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM, TITLE, SUB_TITLE, APP_CATE, FUNC, FUNC_NUM, FUNC_MEASURE, USERID, DATE_FORMAT(GDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS GDATE, DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXPDATE, COUP_CODE, (SELECT IF( DATE_FORMAT(B.EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE(), '만료', ISUSED) ) AS ISUSED FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON A, RHY_MEM_COUPON_DETAIL B, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) C WHERE USERID = #{userid } ) RESULT LIMIT #{startSeq }, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT SEQ, C_SEQ, USERID, DATE_FORMAT(GDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS GDATE, DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXPDATE, COUP_CODE, IF( DATE_FORMAT(EXPDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') < CURDATE(), '만료', ISUSED) AS ISUSED, USED_ID, USED_DATE FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON_DETAIL WHERE COUP_CODE = #{coup_code};
SELECT TITLE, SUB_TITLE, APP_CATE, FUNC, FUNC_NUM, FUNC_MEASURE, RDATE FROM RHY_MEM_COUPON WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
